name: sovereign_gpt
description: A minimal Electron application written with Typescript

scripts.start: cd src/view && ng build --output-path dist --base-href . && cd .. && cd .. && npm run build && electron ./dist/main.js
scripts.make: cd src/view && ng build --output-path dist --base-href . && cd .. && cd .. && npm run build && electron-forge make
scripts.make-win: cd src/view && ng build --output-path dist --base-href . && cd .. && cd .. && npm run build && electron-forge make --platform=win32

author: GitHub
